verses.verse: Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "Chisel <S%H6458><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> stone <S%H68><s%> tablets <S%H3871><s%> like the first: <S%H7223><s%> and I will write <S%H3789><s%> on the tablets <S%H3871><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> that were on the first <S%H7223><s%> tablets, <S%H3871><s%> which you broke. <S%H7665><s%>

Be ready <S%H3559><s%> by the morning, <S%H1242><s%> and come up <S%H5927><s%> in the morning <S%H1242><s%> to Mount <S%H2022><s%> Sinai, <S%H5514><s%> and present <S%H5324><s%> yourself there to me on the top <S%H7218><s%> of the mountain. <S%H2022><s%>

No one <S%H376><s%> shall come up <S%H5927><s%> with you; <S%H408><s%> neither let anyone <S%H376><s%> be seen <S%H7200><s%> throughout all the mountain; <S%H2022><s%> neither let the flocks <S%H6629><s%> nor herds <S%H1241><s%> feed <S%H7462><s%> before <S%H4136><s%> that mountain. <S%H2022><s%>"

He chiseled <S%H6458><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> tablets <S%H3871><s%> of stone <S%H68><s%> like the first; <S%H7223><s%> and Moses <S%H4872><s%> rose up early <S%H7925><s%> in the morning, <S%H1242><s%> and went up <S%H5927><s%> to Mount <S%H2022><s%> Sinai, <S%H5514><s%> as Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> had commanded <S%H6680><s%> him, <S%H3947><s%> and took in his hand <S%H3027><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> stone <S%H68><s%> tablets. <S%H3871><s%>
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> descended <S%H3381><s%> in the cloud, <S%H6051><s%> and stood <S%H3320><s%> with him there, <S%H7121><s%> and proclaimed the name <S%H8034><s%> of Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> passed by <S%H5674><s%> before him, <S%H6440><s%> and proclaimed, <S%H7121><s%> "Yahweh! <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> a merciful <S%H7349><s%> and gracious <S%H2587><s%> God, <S%H410><s%> slow to anger, <S%H750><s%> and abundant <S%H7227><s%> in loving kindness <S%H2617><s%> and truth, <S%H571><s%>

keeping <S%H5341><s%> loving kindness <S%H2617><s%> for thousands, <S%H505><s%> forgiving <S%H5375><s%> iniquity <S%H5771><s%> and disobedience and sin; <S%H2403><s%> and that will by no means <S%H5352><s%> clear <S%H5352><s%> the guilty, <S%H6485><s%> visiting the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of the fathers <S%H1><s%> on the children, <S%H1121><s%> and on the children <S%H1121><s%>'s children, <S%H1121><s%> on the third <S%H8029><s%> and on the fourth generation. <S%H7256><s%>"
Moses <S%H4872><s%> hurried <S%H4116><s%> and bowed his head <S%H6915><s%> toward the earth, <S%H776><s%> and worshiped. <S%H7812><s%>

He said, <S%H559><s%> "If now I have found <S%H4672><s%> favor <S%H2580><s%> in your sight, <S%H5869><s%> Lord, <S%H136><s%> please let the Lord <S%H136><s%> go <S%H3212><s%> in the midst <S%H3212><s%> of us; <S%H7186><s%> although this is a stiff-necked people; <S%H5971><s%> pardon <S%H5545><s%> our iniquity <S%H5771><s%> and our sin, <S%H2403><s%> and take us for your inheritance. <S%H5157><s%>"

He said, <S%H559><s%> "Behold, <S%H3772><s%> I make a covenant: <S%H1285><s%> before all your people <S%H5971><s%> I will do <S%H6213><s%> marvels, <S%H6381><s%> such as have not been worked <S%H1254><s%> in all the earth, <S%H776><s%> nor in any nation; <S%H1471><s%> and all the people <S%H5971><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> which you are shall see <S%H7200><s%> the work <S%H4639><s%> of Yahweh; <S%H3068><s%> for it is an awesome thing <S%H3372><s%> that I do with you. <S%H6213><s%>

Observe <S%H8104><s%> that which I command <S%H6680><s%> you this day. <S%H3117><s%> Behold, <S%H1644><s%> I drive out before <S%H6440><s%> you the Amorite, <S%H567><s%> the Canaanite, <S%H3669><s%> the Hittite, <S%H2850><s%> the Perizzite, <S%H6522><s%> the Hivite, <S%H2340><s%> and the Jebusite. <S%H2983><s%>

Be careful, <S%H8104><s%> lest you make <S%H3772><s%> a covenant <S%H1285><s%> with the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> where you are going, <S%H935><s%> lest it be for a snare <S%H4170><s%> in the midst of you: <S%H7130><s%>
but you shall break <S%H7665><s%> down their altars, <S%H4196><s%> and dash <S%H7665><s%> in pieces their pillars, <S%H4676><s%> and you shall cut down <S%H3772><s%> their Asherim; <S%H842><s%>
for you shall worship <S%H7812><s%> no other <S%H312><s%> god: <S%H410><s%> for Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> whose name <S%H8034><s%> is Jealous, <S%H7067><s%> is a jealous <S%H7067><s%> God. <S%H410><s%>

"Don't <S%H3772><s%> make a covenant <S%H1285><s%> with the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the land, <S%H776><s%> lest they play the prostitute <S%H2181><s%> after <S%H310><s%> their gods, <S%H430><s%> and sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> to their gods, <S%H430><s%> and one call <S%H7121><s%> you and you eat <S%H398><s%> of his sacrifice; <S%H2077><s%>

and you take <S%H3947><s%> of their daughters <S%H1323><s%> to your sons, <S%H1121><s%> and their daughters <S%H1323><s%> play the prostitute <S%H2181><s%> after <S%H310><s%> their gods, <S%H430><s%> and make <S%H2181><s%> your sons <S%H1121><s%> play the prostitute <S%H2181><s%> after <S%H310><s%> their gods. <S%H430><s%>
"You shall make no cast idols for yourselves. <S%H6213><s%>

"You shall keep <S%H8104><s%> the feast <S%H2282><s%> of unleavened bread. <S%H4682><s%> Seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> you shall eat <S%H398><s%> unleavened bread, <S%H4682><s%> as I commanded <S%H6680><s%> you, <S%H4150><s%> at the time appointed in the month <S%H2320><s%> Abib; <S%H24><s%> for in the month <S%H2320><s%> Abib <S%H24><s%> you came out <S%H3318><s%> from Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

"All that opens <S%H6363><s%> the womb <S%H7358><s%> is mine; <S%H4735><s%> and all your livestock that is male, <S%H2142><s%> the firstborn <S%H6363><s%> of cow <S%H7794><s%> and sheep. <S%H7716><s%>

The firstborn <S%H6363><s%> of a donkey <S%H2543><s%> you shall redeem <S%H6299><s%> with a lamb: <S%H7716><s%> and if you will not redeem <S%H6299><s%> it, <S%H6202><s%> then you shall break its neck. All the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> of your sons <S%H1121><s%> you shall redeem. <S%H6299><s%> No one shall appear <S%H7200><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me empty. <S%H7387><s%>

"Six <S%H8337><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> you shall work, <S%H5647><s%> but on the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> you shall rest: <S%H7673><s%> in plowing time <S%H2758><s%> and in harvest <S%H7105><s%> you shall rest. <S%H7673><s%>

"You shall observe <S%H6213><s%> the feast <S%H2282><s%> of weeks <S%H7620><s%> with the first fruits <S%H1061><s%> of wheat <S%H2406><s%> harvest, <S%H7105><s%> and the feast <S%H2282><s%> of harvest <S%H614><s%> at the year <S%H8141><s%>'s end. <S%H8622><s%>

Three <S%H6471><s%> times in the year <S%H8141><s%> all your males <S%H2138><s%> shall appear <S%H7200><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H113><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

For I will drive out <S%H3423><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you and enlarge <S%H7337><s%> your borders; <S%H1366><s%> neither shall any man <S%H376><s%> desire <S%H2530><s%> your land <S%H776><s%> when you go up <S%H5927><s%> to appear <S%H7200><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> three <S%H6471><s%> times in the year. <S%H8141><s%>

"You shall not offer <S%H7819><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> of my sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> with leavened <S%H2557><s%> bread; <S%H2077><s%> neither shall the sacrifice of the feast <S%H2282><s%> of the Passover <S%H6453><s%> be left <S%H3885><s%> to the morning. <S%H1242><s%>

"You shall bring the first <S%H7225><s%> of the first <S%H7225><s%> fruits <S%H1061><s%> of your ground <S%H127><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%> "You shall not boil <S%H1310><s%> a young goat <S%H1423><s%> in its mother <S%H517><s%>'s milk. <S%H2461><s%>"

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "Write <S%H3789><s%> you these words: <S%H1697><s%> for in accordance <S%H6310><s%> with these words <S%H1697><s%> I have made <S%H3772><s%> a covenant <S%H1285><s%> with you and with Israel. <S%H3478><s%>"

He was there with Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> and forty <S%H705><s%> nights; <S%H3915><s%> he neither ate <S%H398><s%> bread, <S%H3899><s%> nor drank <S%H8354><s%> water. <S%H4325><s%> He wrote <S%H3789><s%> on the tablets <S%H3871><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of the covenant, <S%H1285><s%> the ten <S%H6235><s%> commandments. <S%H1697><s%>

It happened, <S%H4872><s%> when Moses came down <S%H3381><s%> from Mount <S%H2022><s%> Sinai <S%H5514><s%> with the two <S%H8147><s%> tablets <S%H3871><s%> of the testimony <S%H5715><s%> in Moses <S%H4872><s%>' hand, <S%H3027><s%> when he came down <S%H3381><s%> from the mountain, <S%H2022><s%> that Moses <S%H4872><s%> didn't <S%H3045><s%> know that the skin <S%H5785><s%> of his face <S%H6440><s%> shone <S%H7160><s%> by reason of his speaking with him. <S%H1696><s%>

When Aaron <S%H175><s%> and all the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> behold, <S%H5785><s%> the skin of his face <S%H6440><s%> shone; <S%H7160><s%> and they were afraid <S%H3372><s%> to come near him. <S%H5066><s%>

Moses <S%H4872><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> to them, <S%H175><s%> and Aaron and all the rulers <S%H5387><s%> of the congregation <S%H5712><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%> to him; <S%H4872><s%> and Moses spoke to them. <S%H1696><s%>

Afterward <S%H310><s%> all the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> came near, <S%H5066><s%> and he gave them all of the commandments <S%H6680><s%> that Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> had spoken <S%H1696><s%> with him on Mount <S%H2022><s%> Sinai. <S%H5514><s%>
When Moses <S%H4872><s%> was done <S%H3615><s%> speaking <S%H1696><s%> with them, <S%H5414><s%> he put a veil <S%H4533><s%> on his face. <S%H6440><s%>

But when Moses <S%H4872><s%> went in <S%H935><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> to speak <S%H1696><s%> with him, <S%H5493><s%> he took the veil <S%H4533><s%> off, <S%H5493><s%> until he came out; <S%H3318><s%> and he came out, <S%H3318><s%> and spoke <S%H1696><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> that which he was commanded. <S%H6680><s%>

The children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>' face, <S%H6440><s%> that the skin <S%H5785><s%> of Moses <S%H4872><s%>' face <S%H6440><s%> shone: <S%H7160><s%> and Moses <S%H4872><s%> put <S%H7725><s%> the veil <S%H4533><s%> on his face <S%H6440><s%> again, <S%H7725><s%> until he went <S%H935><s%> in to speak with him. <S%H1696><s%>
